name: MAKE THEM FAIL!
description:
STORY:

YOU ARE ABOUT TO FAIL A TEST.

NO ONE ELSE MUST BE ALLOWED TO PASS.

YELL AT THE OTHER STUDENTS. BERATE THEM. DISTRACT THEM.

MAKE THEM FAIL.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

RMB / LMB / J / K / L - Yell (MASH THESE TO SUCCEED)

GAMEPLAY:

Your goal is to get all of the students in the room to fail by yelling at them until they give up!

Don't get caught by teachers or they'll apprehend you! 

Students will slowly complete their tests and pass. You need to be fast enough to make them fail before that happens!

Have fun!
